[i]Valiant[/i] – Whenever Seijuku Intercessor Unit becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, you may [b][tap target creature. Put a stun counter on it][/b] if it was already tapped.
Flash paradigm {U} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
